content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. How much are you willing to offer for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student and I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. I would say 500 euros per month would be fair.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros per month is below my expectations. This apartment is in the city center, close to all amenities, and it's newly built. I think a more reasonable offer would be around 800 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 800 euros per month is too high for me as a student. I'm willing to pay 600 euros per month. I can also sign a long-term contract.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 600 euros per month is still lower than what I'm hoping for. With the location and the quality of the apartment, I believe 700 euros per month would be a more appropriate rate. What's your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but 700 euros per month is still too high for me as a student. I'm willing to pay 650 euros per month, which is really my maximum budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 650 euros per month is still not enough for me to accept. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate its value. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'll have to consider other potential tenants.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you and I have not found a common ground regarding the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your decision, Max. If you change your mind or have any other questions, feel free to contact me. Thank you for your time.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max. Good luck with your search for an apartment. I hope you find something that fits within your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
